item.title: Operations that Span Multiple Event Streams with the Critter Stack
item.description: Let’s just say that Marten incurs some serious benefits to being on top of PostgreSQL and its very strong support for transactional integrity as opposed to some of the high profile commercial Event Sourcing tools who are spending a lot of time and energy on their “Dynamic Consistency Boundary” concept because they lack the ACID … Continue reading Operations that Span Multiple Event Streams with the Critter Stack → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.

item.title: Need Some Feedback on Near Term Wolverine Work
item.description: That’s supposed to be a play on a Wolverine as Winnie the Pooh in his “thinking spot” I’m wrestling a little bit with whether the new features and changes coming into Wolverine very soon are worthy of a 5.0 release even though 4.0 was just a couple months ago. I’d love any and all feedback … Continue reading Need Some Feedback on Near Term Wolverine Work → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.
